â€œTrying blue haze vs. blue dream...blue haze wins. You can function at work and be relaxed. Good for migraines. Great for afternoon or if your stressed in the morning. Definitely an underrated strain. Smooth smoke.â€
â€œBlue Dream Haze" = Blue Dream x Haze: excellent clear-minded and energetic sativa!â€"
â€œvery nice head buzz to start off,but am engaged and focused.pain level is way down and can do moderate tasks.This is a high quality medicine for me(in my top five favorites).â€

â€œRelax with Blue Haze.  I like to puff on this while I'm making dinner.  So relaxing.  I defy you not to smile!  Brings on a feeling of happiness that you should experience for yourself. They'll feel zero paranoia on this strain .....They will thank you and ask where you bought it..â€

â€œThe high is very energetic. Tastes very sweet. Easy to focus and get things done. You'll look up and a few hours will be missing. Not good for falling asleep, because you pretty much just lay there and think about stuff.â€

column1: Hits like a freight train after 5 minutes.  Cannot say when I will feel like moving.  Totally couch locked!â€"

column3: â€œThis is, so far, my absolute favorite sativa strain. I haven't been lucky enough to try super silver haze yet, but until then this strain is my #1. Blue haze helps me focus, relieves stress, wakes me up, removes anxiety, helps my creative thinking process, everything good. I suffer from severe depression and anxiety but take a pill each day (40mg of Paxil once a day) that allows me to function. Blue Haze turns me int...â€

â€œAs someone who has not used cannabis in over 20 years, this has been my favorite strain so far after trying about 10 various others. For anxiety and stress, Blue Haze gives a nice, mellow feel of relaxation without the unfocused feeling I've had with other strains. Works well on reducing chronic muscle pain also. Liking this one - it's a keeper in my natural medicine cabinet.â€

â€œMigraine pain mild; nausea 6-7 when I medicated round 1800 or so. Takes bout 5 min to start working. Pain/nausea gone. No anxiety/paranoia (absolute must for me). Body high allowed me to eat dinner & enjoy a relaxing evening. Did not expect the head high to be sooo heavy. I guess I shoulda maybe expected that if this is a Blueberry cross. But, definitely got the job done & I slept great that night! Highly recommend f...â€

â€œI've been going through alot within the last few months so naturally i was seeking a medicine that would help cure depression without the long body high that an potent Indica has too offer. mental vs physical. yah know. â€œThis one is interesting... I love the flavor it is a good balance between the berry and earthy funk! It for me has proven to be a great wake n bake strain providing a mild euphoria with some easing of pain. creative and productive. recommended for a great anytime strain.â€

â€œthis is the SUV of weed. good for chilling, good for a party and laughing your a$$ off. I've baked one pre-work and had a productive (for me) day. I think it tastes a little sweet/woody/nutty. like granola. All in all you can't go wrong.â€
